content: **knitted hat / hipster hat for men in drops alpaca the piece is worked bottom up with rib sizes s - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no z-929 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head size approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100 g colour 6309 medium petrol **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size ~
